span.span: Provides helper logging methods used by tasks.

MemberSignature.Value: public string ExtractMessageCode (string message, out string messageWithoutCodePrefix);
.method public hidebysig instance string ExtractMessageCode(string message, [out] string& messageWithoutCodePrefix) cil managed
Public Function ExtractMessageCode (message As String, ByRef messageWithoutCodePrefix As String) As String
public: System::String ^ ExtractMessageCode(System::String ^ message, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] System::String ^ % messageWithoutCodePrefix);
member this.ExtractMessageCode : string * -> string

param.name: message
param.span: 要剖析且包含訊息碼前置詞的完整訊息。

span.span: The full message to parse that includes code prefix.

param.name: messageWithoutCodePrefix
param.span: 已移除訊息碼前置詞的訊息。

span.span: The message with the code prefix removed.

summary.span: 從指定的完整訊息字串中擷取訊息碼前置詞。

span.span: Extracts the message code prefix from the given full message string.

returns.span: 從完整訊息字串擷取的訊息碼前置詞，如果沒有任何訊息碼則為 。

span.span: The message code prefix that is extracted from the full message string, or if there is no message code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 訊息碼前置詞必須符合下列.NET 規則運算式，才能辨識： `^\s*[A-Za-z]+\d+:\s*`。Message code prefixes must match the following .NET regular expressions in order to be recognized: `^\s*[A-Za-z]+\d+:\s*`. ## Examples 如果這個方法指定完整訊息字串`MYTASK1001: This is an error message.`和它接受`This is an error message.`做為值`messageWithoutCodePrefix`參數，則它會傳回`MYTASK1001`。If this method is given the full message string `MYTASK1001: This is an error message.` and it accepts `This is an error message.` as the value for the `messageWithoutCodePrefix` parameter, then it returns `MYTASK1001`.

span.span: is .

span.span: Loads the specified resource string and optionally formats it using the given arguments.
The formatted string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 目前執行緒的文化特性進行格式化。The culture of the current thread is used for formatting. 此方法需要具有已註冊其資源的其中一種擁有者工作基底類別建構函式，或屬性。This method requires the owner task to have registered its resources with either the base class constructor, or the property.

exception.span: 表示的字串資源不存在。

span.span: The string resource indicated by does not exist.

exception.span: 未設定擁有人工作的 屬性。

span.span: The property of the owner task is not set.
is .

MemberSignature.Value: public string HelpKeywordPrefix { get; set; }
.property instance string HelpKeywordPrefix
Public Property HelpKeywordPrefix As String
public: property System::String ^ HelpKeywordPrefix { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.HelpKeywordPrefix : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定前置詞，用來撰寫來自資源名稱的 Help 關鍵字。

span.span: Gets or sets the prefix used to compose Help keywords from resource names.

value.span: 前置詞，用來撰寫來自資源名稱的 Help 關鍵字。

span.span: The prefix used to compose Help keywords from resource names.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果工作不需要其訊息相關聯的 Help 關鍵字，它可以忽略這個屬性，或將它設定為`null`。If a task does not have Help keywords associated with its messages, it can ignore this property or set it to `null`. 如果這個屬性設定為空，資源名稱將用於逐字做 Help 關鍵字。If this property is set to an empty , resource names will be used verbatim as Help keywords.

span.span: However, InitializeLifetimeService and MarkAsInactive should only be called in that order, together or not at all, and no more than once.

MemberSignature.Usage: taskLoggingHelper.LogErrorFromResources (subcategoryResourceName, errorCode, helpKeyword, file, lineNumber, columnNumber, endLineNumber, endColumnNumber, messageResourceName, messageArgs)

param.name: subcategoryResourceName
param.span: 描述錯誤類型之字串資源的名稱。

span.span: The name of the string resource that describes the error type.

param.name: errorCode
param.span: 錯誤碼。

span.span: The error code.

param.name: helpKeyword
param.span: 要與錯誤相關聯的 Help 關鍵字。

span.span: The Help keyword to associate with the error.

param.name: file
param.span: 包含此錯誤的檔案路徑。

span.span: The path to the file containing the error.

param.name: lineNumber
param.span: 檔案中發生錯誤的行。

span.span: The line in the file where the error occurs.

param.name: columnNumber
param.span: 檔案中發生錯誤的資料行。

span.span: The column in the file where the error occurs.

param.name: endLineNumber
param.span: 檔案中發生錯誤的結尾行。

span.span: The end line in the file where the error occurs.

param.name: endColumnNumber
param.span: 檔案中發生錯誤的結尾資料行。

span.span: The end column in the file where the error occurs.

param.name: messageResourceName
param.span: 要載入之字串資源的名稱。

span.span: The name of the string resource to load.

param.name: messageArgs
param.span: 用來格式化載入字串的引數。

span.span: The arguments for formatting the loaded string.

summary.span: 使用指定的資源字串和其他錯誤詳細資料來記錄錯誤。

span.span: Logs an error using the specified resource string and other error details.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 參數`subCategoryResourceName`， `errorCode`， `helpKeyword`，和`file`可以`null`。The parameters `subCategoryResourceName`, `errorCode`, `helpKeyword`, and `file` can be `null`. 參數`lineNumber`， `columnNumber`， `endLineNumber`，和`endColumnNumber`它們無法使用時應該設定為 0。The parameters `lineNumber`, `columnNumber`, `endLineNumber`, and `endColumnNumber` should be set to 0 if they are not available.

span.span: is .

summary.span: 使用指定的資源字串記錄具有錯誤碼的錯誤。

span.span: Logs an error with an error code using the specified resource string.

MemberSignature.Value: public void LogErrorWithCodeFromResources (string messageResourceName, params object[] messageArgs);
.method public hidebysig instance void LogErrorWithCodeFromResources(string messageResourceName, object[] messageArgs) cil managed
Public Sub LogErrorWithCodeFromResources (messageResourceName As String, ParamArray messageArgs As Object())
public: void LogErrorWithCodeFromResources(System::String ^ messageResourceName, ... cli::array <System::Object ^> ^ messageArgs);
member this.LogErrorWithCodeFromResources : string * obj[] -> unit

param.name: messageResourceName
param.span: 要載入之字串資源的名稱。

span.span: The name of the string resource to load.

param.name: messageArgs
param.span: 用來格式化載入字串的引數。

span.span: The arguments for formatting the loaded string.

summary.span: 使用指定的資源字串記錄具有錯誤碼的錯誤。

span.span: Logs an error with an error code using the specified resource string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果訊息開始，並出現錯誤代碼，程式碼會擷取並使用訊息記錄。If the message begins with an error code, the code is extracted and logged with the message. 如果已提供 Help 關鍵字前置詞，則也會與訊息記錄。If a Help keyword prefix has been provided, it is also logged with the message. 說明關鍵字的組成方式，將字串資源名稱附加至 Help 關鍵字前置詞。The Help keyword is composed by appending the string resource name to the Help keyword prefix. 工作可以提供其中一種 Help 關鍵字前置詞基底類別建構函式，或屬性。A task can provide a Help keyword prefix with either the base class constructor, or the property.

span.span: is .

span.span: if an error was logged; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 錯誤訊息和警告只會記錄符合標準格式的程式碼行中。Errors messages and warnings are only logged for lines that fit the canonical format. 所有其他行會被視為訊息。All other lines are treated as messages.

span.span: is .

summary.span: 使用指定的資源字串，記錄警告和警告碼。

span.span: Logs a warning with a warning code using the specified resource string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果訊息的開頭警告的程式碼，程式碼會擷取並使用訊息記錄。If the message begins with a warning code, the code is extracted and logged with the message. 如果已提供 Help 關鍵字前置詞，則也會與訊息記錄。If a Help keyword prefix has been provided, it is also logged with the message. 說明關鍵字的組成方式，將字串資源名稱附加至 Help 關鍵字前置詞。The Help keyword is composed by appending the string resource name to the Help keyword prefix. 工作可以提供其中一種 Help 關鍵字前置詞基底類別建構函式，或屬性。A task can provide a Help keyword prefix with either the base class constructor, or the property.

span.span: is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果訊息的開頭警告的程式碼，程式碼會擷取並使用訊息記錄。If the message begins with a warning code, the code is extracted and logged with the message. 如果已提供 Help 關鍵字前置詞，則也會與訊息記錄。If a Help keyword prefix has been provided, it is also logged with the message. 說明關鍵字的組成方式，將字串資源名稱附加至 Help 關鍵字前置詞。The Help keyword is composed by appending the string resource name to the Help keyword prefix. 工作可以提供其中一種 Help 關鍵字前置詞基底類別建構函式，或屬性。A task can provide a Help keyword prefix with either the base class constructor, or the property. 參數`subCategoryResourceName`，和`file`可以`null`。The parameters `subCategoryResourceName`, and `file` can be `null`. 參數`lineNumber`， `columnNumber`， `endLineNumber`，和`endColumnNumber`它們無法使用時應該設定為 0。The parameters `lineNumber`, `columnNumber`, `endLineNumber`, and `endColumnNumber` should be set to 0 if they are not available.

MemberSignature.Value: public void MarkAsInactive ();
.method public hidebysig instance void MarkAsInactive() cil managed
Public Sub MarkAsInactive ()
public: void MarkAsInactive();
member this.MarkAsInactive : unit -> unit

summary.span: 告知這個 ，不再需要它。

span.span: Notifies this that it is no longer needed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法是安全執行緒，不過，必須依照該順序，來呼叫 InitializeLifetimeService 和 MarkAsInactive，或您必須呼叫這兩種方法，而且您必須呼叫一次以上這兩種方法。This method is thread safe, however, you must call both InitializeLifetimeService and MarkAsInactive, in that order, or you must call neither method, and you must call neither method than once.

summary.span: 取得或設定記錄方法所使用之文化特性專屬的資源。

span.span: Gets or sets the culture-specific resources used by the logging methods.

value.span: ，表示記錄方法使用的文化特性資源。

span.span: A that represents the culture-specific resources used by the logging methods.
This value can be .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果衍生的類別已當地語系化的字串，它們應該處理這個屬性註冊其資源。If derived classes have localized strings, then they should register their resources with this property.
